title: This HomeGoods Mug Comes in the Cutest Shape Ever
description: If you love Western-inspired decor, check this out. READ MORE...
author: Isabella Hussar
excerpt: If you love Western-inspired decor, check this out.

All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: Chiociolla/ShutterstockThanks to #homegoodsfinds, I just spotted the most adorable boot-shaped mug adorned with red hearts on TikTok! TikTokers have already snatched them off the shelves of HomeGoods, and I’m convinced I should buy one too. The seemingly ceramic mugs are shaped like cowboy boots, and they’re light pink and covered in red hearts. Basically, they’re perfect for the yeehaw-core aesthetic, with some heart-covered cuteness, to boot (sorry, sorry).  When Cristina Isabel Lara (@cristinalara1116) showed off the sweet find on TikTok, one person brilliantly commented on the video, “Omg! Cute for flower holder.” I’m already imagining how nice this would look on my living room coffee table filled with pink tulips.I love how versatile this mug can be. Not only could you use it to display a bouquet of flowers, but it would also be perfect to hold pens and pencils or makeup brushes. You could, of course, drink from it too (perhaps the perfect milkshake glass?), or keep it on a bookshelf as a standalone statement piece. HomeGoods has seemingly sold boot mugs for a while (here’s a Christmas one and a pink bow one, and here’s a pink and white one from February), but this heart-themed option appears new (to TikTokers, at least) and perfect for Valentine’s Day decor (although, to be clear, I believe in year-round heart decorations). I couldn’t find the price of the heart boot mug online, but this gingerbread version has a $5.99 price tag on it. If you’d rather buy a similar option through in-store pickup or online and are OK forgoing the little red hearts, check out these alternative cuties from World Market and Target.

Isabella Hussar is an aspiring journalist at Rutgers University. She is published in Rutgers' Daily Targum and HerCampus, and works for Rutgers' School of Communication & Information. If she's not in her cozy college apartment, you can most definitely find her in New York,…read more

published now

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

Thanks to #homegoodsfinds, I just spotted the most adorable boot-shaped mug adorned with red hearts on TikTok! TikTokers have already snatched them off the shelves of HomeGoods, and I’m convinced I should buy one too. 

The seemingly ceramic mugs are shaped like cowboy boots, and they’re light pink and covered in red hearts. Basically, they’re perfect for the yeehaw-core aesthetic, with some heart-covered cuteness, to boot (sorry, sorry).  

When Cristina Isabel Lara (@cristinalara1116) showed off the sweet find on TikTok, one person brilliantly commented on the video, “Omg! Cute for flower holder.” I’m already imagining how nice this would look on my living room coffee table filled with pink tulips.

I love how versatile this mug can be. Not only could you use it to display a bouquet of flowers, but it would also be perfect to hold pens and pencils or makeup brushes. You could, of course, drink from it too (perhaps the perfect milkshake glass?), or keep it on a bookshelf as a standalone statement piece. 

HomeGoods has seemingly sold boot mugs for a while (here’s a Christmas one and a pink bow one, and here’s a pink and white one from February), but this heart-themed option appears new (to TikTokers, at least) and perfect for Valentine’s Day decor (although, to be clear, I believe in year-round heart decorations). 

I couldn’t find the price of the heart boot mug online, but this gingerbread version has a $5.99 price tag on it. 

If you’d rather buy a similar option through in-store pickup or online and are OK forgoing the little red hearts, check out these alternative cuties from World Market and Target.
